title: ISic020445. ISic020445
body:
Facsimile Images

a
1ΑΡΙΣΤΟΚΛΕΙΑΣΕ̄ΜΙΤΑΣΚΑΛΑΣΚΑΛΑ|ͰΑΥΤΑΔ᾽Ε̄ΜΑΠΙΘΑϘΟΣΑΙΤΕ̄ΣΑΣΕΧΕΙ
b
1((Α))Η

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena 1989 (IGASM I) with slight changes based on photograph. ; Guarducci: hαύτα δὲ μά (= μή)

English translation

I am Aristocleias' the beautiful the beautiful (lekythos), and she is mine; Pithacos after demanding her owns her.

Italian translation

Io sono la bella (lekythos) della bella Aristocleias, e lei è mia; Pithacos dopo averla reclamata la possiede.

commentary

bibliography

  • Arena 1989 57, fig.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000638
  • Guarducci 1987 137-138, fig.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002770
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
